name: Highway Chained Car Racer
description:
Welcome to the most challenging Highway Chained Car Racer game. Car racing has always been a very thrilling and an exciting event. People love to watch car racing, but this is differet racing game from simple racing games. they watch on televisions or even gather around the racing tracks to watch the driving and drifting skills of world famous car racers.

Highway Chained Car Racer :features

Realistic car physics and controls
Beautiful stunt game environment
Most realistic car chain AI
Challenging and thrilling levels
Multiple chained luxury turbo cars
Smooth easy controls
Stunning 3D graphic
